sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"大约，差不多"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: almost, nearly, about, approximately, around, roughly
means: almost ：指在程度上相差很小，差不多。
nearly与almost含义基本相同，侧重指数量、时间或空间上的接近。
about ：常可分almost和nearly换用，但about用于表示时间、数量的"大约"时，实际数量可能多也可能少。
approximately ：多用于书面语，指精确度接近某个标准以致误差可忽略不计。
around ：多用于非正式场合，常见于美国英语。

stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+most最多→adv.几乎, 差不多
al全部+ready准备→全部准备好了
al全部+so如此→全部如此→也,同样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+together共同, 一起→adv.完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
al加强+though虽然→conj.虽然, 尽管

expand_knowledge_list.cn: al同all, 全部的；most, 大多数的

entry.def: You use almost to indicate that something is not completely the case but is nearly the case.

example.ex: The couple had been dating for almost three years...
Storms have been hitting almost all of Britain recently...
example.tran: 最近几乎整个英国都受到了暴风雨的侵袭。

means.word_mean: 1. (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished; `near' is sometimes used informally for `nearly' and `most' is sometimes used informally for `almost';

sentences.sentence: "the baby was almost asleep when the alarm sounded"
"the car all but ran her down"
"virtually all the parties signed the contract"
"I was near exhausted by the run"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  æl mæst 'for the most part' (see all, most)

sentences.cn: 他们几乎什么都吃。
sentences.en: They'll eat almost anything.

sentences.cn: 几乎没人相信他的话。
sentences.en: Almost no one (= hardly anyone) believed him.

sentences.cn: 是差不多该走的时候了。
sentences.en: It's almost time to go.

sentences.cn: 饭就要做好了。
sentences.en: Dinner's almost ready.

sentences.en: He slipped and almost fell.

sentences.en: Their house is almost opposite ours.

sentences.cn: 我差不多所有的都喜欢。
sentences.en: I like almost all of them.

sentences.cn: 这是他们几乎总要犯的错误。
sentences.en: It's a mistake they almost always make.

sentences.cn: 这个故事几乎肯定是虚构的。
sentences.en: The story is almost certainly false.

sentences.cn: 最近几乎整个英国都受到了暴风雨的侵袭。
sentences.en: Storms have been hitting almost all of Britain recently...

sentences.cn: 这对情侣相恋已近3年。
sentences.en: The couple had been dating for almost three years...

sentences.en: Hello everyone, today I will introduce the U.S. are Yamaguchi.

sentences.cn: 我太渴了,真想喝一杯茶.
sentences.en: I'm so thirsty I'm almost dying for a cuppa.

sentences.cn: 雷达波几乎可以同时追着多个目标.
sentences.en: The radar beam can track a number of targets almost simultaneously.

sentences.cn: 我们一定快到丹佛了.
sentences.en: We must be almost to Denver.

sentences.cn: 雨几乎停了, 现在只是在下毛毛雨.
sentences.en: The rain has almost stopped, it's just drizzling now.

sentences.cn: 他再婚了,匆忙得几乎有失体面.
sentences.en: He married again with almost indecent haste.

sentences.cn: 我该清醒认识自己了. 我无所事事浪费了太多的时间, 差点毁了我的事业.
sentences.en: It is time I woke up to myself. I've wasted too much time fooling around, and I almost ruined my career.

sentences.en: Almost as a reflex action, I grab my pen as the phone rings.

sentences.en: History shows that New Zealand are almost unbeatable by British teams on their own turf.

sentences.cn: 三名选手几乎同时赛完.
sentences.en: Three racers finished with almost exactly the same time.

sentences.cn: 她几乎不为人察觉地点了一下头作为回答.
sentences.en: She answered with an almost imperceptible nod of the head.
